categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the New Jedi Order

nodes.text: Drif Lij was a male Barabel Jedi Knight during the war against the Yuuzhan Vong. He was a member of Saba Sebatyne's Wild Knights Squadron, and trained under Saba. Two years into the war, Drif died when his X-Wing was destroyed in the Battle of Coruscant.
